value:
I went ahead and brought some
nautical charts, just in case. Better
safe than sorry.

I don't know how I feel about relaxing
in times like these. So, let's just call
this "morale building," all right?

When I go somewhere new, I have an
itch to wander around and see every
nook and cranny of it.

I see the value in these light outfits.
If you're fighting in water, you don't
want bulky armor weighing you down.

With all this fresh fruit, we'd be fools
not to make tropical elixirs. Come on,
help me whip them up!

Summer tidings from your friend.
Hm? Oh, don't mention it. Just doing
what $Nf asked.

The sunshine's done me good.
I'm stronger than ever!

Land or sea, doesn't matter—the
battle's always won by whoever
trained the hardest.
Ugh, why can't I focus?
It's been a productive summer.

I'm Shez. Not an expert in aquatic
combat, but I'm adaptable. Hm? You
brought me here to relax?

I've already told you about my
upbringing, right? How I was raised in
the mountains?$k$pWell, when that's all you've known
your whole life, an ocean's a hard
thing to comprehend.$k$pNot that it was boring where I
came from. There was activity if you
knew where to look.$k$pThe animals bustling around, the
landscape changing color with the
seasons.$k$pBut an ocean—it's nothing but
activity. Water moving and shifting
every second you look at it.$k$pIt's mesmerizing to watch...and a little
unsettling too.$k$pEverything disappears under the
waves... Once the currents have you,
it's over.$k$pIt makes me think: Will I get
swallowed up in the undertow of
history, my name lost in the depths?$k$pI don't think so. As long as I'm alive,
I still have a say—and that's gotta be
worth something.$k$pI'll leave a mark while I'm still around,
just you watch.
Get back!
Time to ride that wave!
This'll be a clean sweep!
Clear skies, smooth sailing.
I was careless...
Gotta say, this outfit's pretty easy to move around in. Consider me convinced.
Hm? What, never seen muscles before?
Up for some long-distance swimming? It's great training, you know.
Can't take my eyes off the map, especially on the water...
Sure, I was raised in the mountains, but it's not like I mind visiting the sea.
Look at all that fruit! Wonder if it's tasty…
Don't worry. If I see you struggling, I'll be the first to come to your rescue.
Got it.
You ready?
I can handle it.
